def FrequencyMap(Text, k):
    # your code here
    freq = {}
    n = len(Text)
    
    for i in range(n-k+1):
        Pattern = Text[i:i+k]
        freq[Pattern] = 0
    
    for i in range(n-k+1):
        Pattern = Text[i:i+k]
        if freq[Pattern] >= 0 :
          freq[Pattern]=freq[Pattern]+1
      
        
         
    for i in range(n-k+1):
       Pattern = Text[i:i+k]
      # print freq[Pattern]
    return freq
  
  
def FrequentWords(Text, k):
    words = []
    freq = FrequencyMap(Text, k)
   # print freq
    m = max(freq.values())
   # print "------------"
    print "%s occurences" %(m)
    print "-------------"
    for key in freq:
        if freq[key]== m:
          inter=[key]
          words.append(inter)
   # print (words) 
    return words
